sentences.en: ...some of the finest photojournalism of the Civil Rights era.
sentences.cn: ...一些民权运动时期最为优秀的摄影新闻。

sentences.en: This is amazing animal love. Unbelievable bit of photojournalism. Real life events.
sentences.cn: 令人惊讶的动物之情. 难以置信的照片记录, 真实生活事件.

words.tran_cn: 上照的；适于摄影的；由光导致的
摄影的；逼真的；（尤指记忆）详细准确的

trans.tran_en: the job or activity of reporting news stories in newspapers and magazines using mainly photographs instead of words
